item.title: 5m Thoughts Series Introduction
item.author: Author
item.description: I welcome you with the introduction of my first series. My guess is, that this won’t be the last one as well ðŸ˜‰. 5 Minute Thoughts Is a series about short self challenged ideas. This is mainly because I’m exploring or evaluating topics by either talking or in this case writing about them.
